title: god ples help me i cant get out of silver with my feeding teammates 24/7 im so tilited beusce of it
body: every game since I got ranked has had 2 feeders on my team or more, its tilting me so hard I cant carry that hard every game it is hurting my feelings help me someone or tell me what to do

replies.body:
You don't realise the number of mistakes you make. I can climb out of silver on ADC without a keyboard so saying that "gg noob feeding team" is not really a viable excuse.
You literally just need to get gud by playing more and you will slowly climb automatically

Gold and plat isn't much better dude, trust me.
In fact I would argue that they are worse.

What kind of win rate do you have? I would think I'm a pretty good support with the ability to carry a game (decent map control with {{item:3512}} )and yet with 5 wins out of 10 in my promos I am now in Bronze 5

I usually have about a 55% (Ish) winrate.
I'm still doing my provisionals and stuff, will have to see what the future holds.

ZZ-rots only good if the enemy has one, or they have a split pusher.
(Most of the time it isn't actually bad)
Drop it behind a tower or infront of an inhibitor and group with your team.
I feel the same way my dude.
